ICC Code proposal submitted

Mr. Hyde of ID
ID adopts the IRC, but they do not adopt Chapter 44 of the IRC; ID accepts the latest version of standards used in the code.  So the only proposal put forward is for their IMC.
ID had changes to 1104.3 are minimized to only adding the new first sentence “High probability systems used for human comfort shall use Group A1 or A2L refrigerant.”
